name: Galaxy Force II
overview: BGM became CD-DA, and prologue story was arranged greatly including the insertion of the visual demo with narration of Tsubakino . Yoshinori Sunahara is in charge of the sound effects. Compatible with Sharp 's analog joystick " Cyber Stick ". It is possible to select the degree of difficulty. Like the arcade version, the screen is composed of sprites. In all stages other than Stage 1 and part of the final stage, effects such as tilt and rotation of the background have been deleted. In addition, the expansion and contraction pattern of the character is unusually small and the sense of depth is lost, and this point becomes felt as it progresses to the second half stage. Compared with the same version afterburner ported by the company before, the degree of portability is slightly higher, but still the game nature and the dynamic of the image are much lower than the original.
